gearshift.core.model package¶

Subpackages¶

  • gearshift.core.model.calculateShiftpointsNdvFullPC package
    • Subpackages
      • gearshift.core.model.calculateShiftpointsNdvFullPC.corrections package
        • Module contents
    • Module contents
  • gearshift.core.model.scaleTrace package
    • Module contents

Module contents¶

It provides GEARSHIFT architecture model dsp.

Sub-Modules:

scaleTrace

It provides GEARSHIFT model dsp to obtain the speed trace following Sub-Annex 1 of the Annex XXI from the COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) 2017/1151.

calculateShiftpointsNdvFullPC

It provides GEARSHIFT model dsp to obtain the gearshifts following Sub-Annex 2 of the Annex XXI from the COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) 2017/1151.
